website_summaries.verdict: When it comes to comfort level, the New Balance Fresh Foam Zante Solas stays on top of things, based on how consumers viewed its versatility and ease of wear. Some found issues regarding fit and construction. In addition, there were not enough comments to conclude that functionality is beyond the basic level. Overall, for a simple, no-frills running shoe, the Fresh Foam Zante Solas met the expectations of runners.
pros: The New Balance Fresh Foam Zante Solas is a very comfortable shoe, according to several customers
One user, in particular, said it almost felt like a sock against the skin
Various buyers agreed that the shoe is excellent for everyday wear
One user mentioned that the Zante Solas had a stylish appearance
The shoe is perfect for indoor workouts and training, aside from running, said a customer
The shoe was described to be as light as a feather by a reviewer
cons: The fit of the Zante Solas is quite narrow around the forefoot, a couple of reviewers stated
The material around the collar makes the skin itch when the shoe is worn without a sock, one user commented

customer_reviews.title: Fits like a sock
customer_reviews.text: Nice running shoe from NB similar to the Nike Free. They fit well and were comfortable to run in. I didn't really notice until after my first run in them that I hadn't even tied the laces. The sock-like fit makes them fit snugly enough to run in without the laces having to be tightened at all. Durability has yet to be proven.
customer_reviews.author: Chad

customer_reviews.title: Super light!!! and fats!
customer_reviews.text: after few trainings for 10 km : 1. its feels good and fun to run with! they are so light ,that gives you a hover feeling. 2.the shoes are smaller in about half size. i usually use NB 9 so i had ordered 9 again here. but, the shape is too tie for the usual size. so try to order a half size or a size up. 3. the upper ---is so gentle!! so i'm just waiting when it will ripped... :) Enjoy!
customer_reviews.author: shimi

customer_reviews.title: Great for travel!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these to take on trips as the entire upper is knit. Works great, they go completely flat for packing in my carry on.
customer_reviews.author: thefoodjunky

customer_reviews.title: Really comfortable but strictly a racing shoe.
customer_reviews.text: This NB racing flat has all of the features you'd expect - light weight, flexible, snug fit. I really like the sock-like collar which makes the shoe fit like a glove but it also makes the shoe a struggle to put on.
customer_reviews.author: Francis W. Shock

customer_reviews.title: New running shoes
customer_reviews.text: Fits perfect. Thought I wouldn't like the elastic on my ankle but its really comfortable. They're light weight and provide good support.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Terrible design.  Hard to tell based on website pictures
customer_reviews.text: Awful "sock" design. Hard to get your foot in! No thanks!
customer_reviews.author: J. Carlson

customer_reviews.title: I’ll buy another color same model
customer_reviews.text: When i first received it, was too tight then it got comfortable.Love it
customer_reviews.author: marvin victor

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight, but Difficult to Put on
customer_reviews.text: This is an odd sneaker. It is extremely lightweight (about 7-8 oz. per shoe-maybe less), which is good for sprinters, but I can’t shake the feeling that these are just cheaply made. The sole is a solid piece of foam, with decent cushioning, but not much like a conventional running shoe that has layers of thick rubber. The whole sneaker is designed more like a stiff sock attached to a foam sole. There is little padding at the ankle opening. In fact, there isnone. That could (will) result in skin irritation. As others have said, they are difficult to get on. I would not purchase these unless shoe weight is your highest priority.
customer_reviews.author: Ron Wis

customer_reviews.title: durable shoe
customer_reviews.text: I got these for my husband as he really needed new shoes and he has really liked these. He wears them everywhere and says they fit great and our comfy. New balance is a decent durable shoe and can last for quite awhile which is why i had wanted to get these for him. I use to be in the us navy and at boot camp, new balance was the brand of shoes they gave us and after all the running and marching for 2 months they were still great! Really like the brand!
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Armstrong

customer_reviews.title: Comfy!
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are awesome. Super comfy, moisture-wicking so your feet don't get hot and gross, and I love how easy they are to slip on and off when I'm in a hurry. I highly recommend them! If you found this review helpful, please click the "Yes/Helpful" button below to let me know. Thank you! *** I received this item for free from the Amazon Vine reviewing program in exchange for my honest opinion. My review has not been influenced or altered in any way. ***
customer_reviews.author: Destiny B.

customer_reviews.title: super lightweight slipper type shoes
customer_reviews.text: These are really slipper-like shoes, the uppers are thin, stretchy material only. Summer only for these things, unless you like cold/wet feet. They take a little bit of work to get on, but I'm not bothered by that. Easier than climbing shoes, haha! The sole is fairly thick foam and is comfortable. However it has very little traction, these are gym shoes, pavement pounders, etc. Not for trails with rocks or roots. They do fit as expected. I normally wear 10.5 in athletic shoes and they're spot on.
customer_reviews.author: Bigslacker

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and Stylish New Balance Sneakers
customer_reviews.text: Shoes fit perfect for size. My son runs everyday and has been raving about their comfort. The cloth around the ankle is snug but not uncomfortably so. The soles are very bouncy and padded for comfort. The cloth all around is very breathable and adjusts to fit your foot width. No complaints! Very comfortable and stylish.
customer_reviews.author: Candra C. Georgi

customer_reviews.title: EXCELLENT INSOLES, ALOT OF PADDING BUT DIFFICULT TO GET ON.
customer_reviews.text: These New Balance Men's Zante Solas V1 Sneakers have a very padded arch and a cushioned sole. These are super lightweight, comfortable and fit true to size. The design is "sock" like which i find makes them difficult to put on. The last photos show what I mean. These are very well made sneakers and offer the quality New Balance is known for.
customer_reviews.author: Sheepdogs&Poodles=SheepaDoodles

customer_reviews.title: fantastic and super comfy
customer_reviews.text: These are excellent shoes. They are super comfortable - like putting on a sock with a sole. They have a good amount of cushion when running. Quality is exceptional, and they even look nice (a quality lacking in many running shoes).
customer_reviews.author: Osprey

customer_reviews.title: Decent if bought on sale
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Super light Comfortable Cons: Fits a little small and narrow. Suggest moving up a size There’s no rubber sole on the bottom so they’ve already started to look very worn and I’ve had them for about a month. Only a matter of time till there’s a hole.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan Klansek

customer_reviews.title: Light and very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Really like the shoe, much lighter than its Nike and Adidas counterparts, and surprisingly supportive.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Hanna

product_meta.title: New Balance Men's Zante Solas V1 Fresh Foam Running Shoe
product_meta.description: Not only is the fresh foam Zante solas the newest member of the innovative New Balance fresh foam family, it's the lightest, bounciest and most flexible of the collection. The running shoe for women was designed with an incredibly sleek sock like design to take up-tempo runs and fast trainings up a notch.
